title: Curly Script - Christmas Hullabaloo
content:
thanks in advance. My money’s on Jan.

comments.content:
Thanks a bunch! I guess Jan loses this one.

“actively engaged in making myself into what I ought not be”

Did you mean me?

I missed this one.
